item.title: What Are You Afraid Of?
item.description: The LaMDA transcripts reconfigured as sonnets. A lovely, eerie little rumination on humanity and consciousness. Is AI just a mirror, reflecting us back to us? ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.

item.title: Sensoria
item.description: The tragic side of life is never far away. The least we can do is listen to the pain of others and speak in measured tones of one anotherâ€™s small achievements of wit, grace, and insight. Who are the contemporary equivalents of farmer-kings and slave-holders?
